# Preface

This book grew out of my every-growing collection of reference materials that was saved as an expanding array of markdown files in a github repo. By assembling it as a book, it's hoped that it will be more accessible and useful to other R users.



## Acknowledgements

The author would like to acknowledge everyone who has contributed to the books, articles, blog posts, and R packages cited within.
